name: MazeGame(10minuteBrackeysChallange)
description:
Move with WASD, arrow keys don't work, because of the time limitations I set myself to make this game - I decided to do Brackeys 10 minute game challenge.

This maze game was made from scratch in 10 minutes including:

  • Random maze generation
  • Art
  • Shader Graph
  • Cinemachine

I hope that you would love my game.
